line_1: His puny GREEN-ROOM Wits and Venal Bards,
line_2: LET the Vain Tyrant sit amidst his guards,

line_1: Play how we will, to turn Lords into Bards.
line_2: Bards may be Lords, but 'tis not in the cards,

line_1: Is treason to the Majesty of Bards.
line_2: To think a M— worth my least regards

line_1: 'Twas theirs t'incourage worth, and give to bards
line_2: What now is spent in boxing and in cards:
